```{r} 
#| echo: false
#| results: 'asis' 
#| warning: false
#| eval: false
cat("\n```bibtex\n")
u <- "https://zenodo.org/record/2553043" # universal URL redirects to latest
s <- rvest::session(u)
u <- paste0(s$url, "/export/bibtex") # redirected
out <- rvest::read_html(u)
bibentry <- rvest::html_text(rvest::html_element(out, "pre"))
cat(bibentry)
cat("\n```\n")
```
